title: Core Assembly Regex Patterns - COMPLETED
details:
COMPLETED: Complete catalog and testing of all regex patterns found in NotebookAutomation.Core assembly with their actual patterns and intended usage:

## 1. CourseStructureExtractor.cs - ✅ TESTED
- NumberPrefixRegexPattern: `@"^[0-9]+[_\-\.]+"`
- LeadingNumberOptionalSeparatorRegexPattern: `@"^[0-9]+([_\-\.]+)?"`
- WhitespaceRegexPattern: `@"\s+"`

## 2. YamlHelper.cs - ✅ TESTED
- FrontmatterBlockRegex: `@"^\s*---\s*[\r\n]+(.+?)[\r\n]+\s*---\s*[\r\n]+"`
  - Options: RegexOptions.Compiled | RegexOptions.Singleline

## 3. FriendlyTitleHelper.cs - ✅ TESTED
- LeadingNumberPattern: `@"^[0-9]+([_\-\s]+)"`
  - Options: RegexOptions.IgnoreCase
- SeparatorPattern: `"[_\\-]+"`
- WhitespacePattern: `"\\s+"`
- RomanNumeralIIPattern: `@"\bIi\b"`

## 4. MetadataTemplateManager.cs - ✅ TESTED
- YamlDocumentSeparatorRegex: `@"^---\s*$"`
  - Options: RegexOptions.Multiline

## 5. MarkdownParser.cs - ✅ TESTED
- YamlFrontmatterRegex: `@"^---\s*\n(.*?)\n---\s*\n"`
  - Options: RegexOptions.Singleline
- MarkdownHeaderRegex: `@"^(#+)\s+(.+)$"`

## 6. DocumentNoteBatchProcessor.cs - ✅ TESTED
- NotesHeaderRegex: `@"^##\s+Notes\s*$"`
  - Options: RegexOptions.Multiline | RegexOptions.IgnoreCase

## 7. MarkdownNoteProcessor.cs - ✅ TESTED
- HtmlTagStripperRegex: `@"<.*?>"`
  - Options: RegexOptions.Compiled

## Test File Created:
- Location: NotebookAutomation.Core.Tests\Utils\RegexPatternsTests.cs
- All 13 tests passing
- Covers all regex patterns in the core assembly
- Uses actual regex methods from core classes (not new Regex instances)

## Modifications Made:
- Updated regex methods in core classes to be internal static partial
- Added [GeneratedRegex] attributes where needed
- Fixed method visibility for test accessibility
- Created comprehensive test coverage for all patterns
- Tests verify both positive and negative cases for each regex pattern
